thread.title: Getaway
thread.title_full: Getaway - Review of Ramada New York/Eastside, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Peter G
title: Getaway
text:
Rented room in this motel for a few nights "getaway". Although lobby etc. were impressive and "state of the art" the room left much to be desired. The tv did not have all the advertised channels and the room was overlooking a terraced construction site. On the whole disillusioned by staff treatment who were rather cold at the concierge desk upon request for some routine information.
